Method Detail

redraw

public void redraw(RedrawInstruction instruction)
redraws or adds data to graph, depending on the RedrawInstruction. note: this function should make sure it clears all of its data and gets fresh data.

clear

public void clear()
removes all data from graph

setSize

public void setSize(java.awt.Dimension d)
sets the size of the graph. usually calculated by program.
